subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Knicks and the Denver Nuggets behaved well for 48 minutes, and managed to play a mostly clean and chaos-free game, ending with an impressive victory by the Knicks.
snippet: The Knicks and the Denver Nuggets behaved well for 48 minutes, and managed to play a mostly clean and chaos-free game, ending with an impressive victory by the Knicks.
